terminal.ms3: I'm Elder, a software engineer rooted in Curitiba, Brazil.
terminal.ms4: Please feel free to explore this website and get to know more about me.

1.title: Born
1.description: I was born on February 29, 1992, which was in a leap year.

2.title: First computer
2.description: This is the year when I started loving computers, the year when my father brought a computer to our home.

3.title: Teenage hood
3.description: I completed high school and a technical course in industrial mechanics.

4.title: Exploring a New Career Path
4.description: After working part-time in several small industries as a mechanic, I decided to change my career path and began my studies in Computer Science at UTFPR.

5.title: A Fresh Start in a New Career
5.description: This was the year when I began my internship as a PHP developer at a logistics company, working on warehouse management software.

6.title: Graduated
6.description: First, I graduated üéâ, and afterward, I was hired to work as a Salesforce developer in an Edtech company.

7.title: Transitioned to a New Job Role
7.description: I decided to apply for an open position within the company I was going to join the web team. I was accepted, and that's when I primarily began working with Node.js and TypeScript.

8.title: Change Jobs
8.description: I moved to a new job where I face the challenge of creating a personal financial app from scratch, primarily using React and Node.

9.title: Engaging in Enhancing
9.description: I am presently working as a developer, creating and enhancing features in the financial app that I developed. Simultaneously, I am committed to ongoing self-study to further refine and expand my skill set.
